document.full_text: ivory coast's presidential claimant said on thursday he had asked for eu sanctions to be lifted as a first step to bring the country back to normal, despite a continuing standoff with incumbent laurent gbagbo.
document.title: ivory coast's ouattara seeks recovery despite standoff
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's presidential claimant said on thursday he had asked for eu sanctions to be lifted as a first step to bring the country back to normal, despite a continuing standoff with incumbent laurent gbagbo.
